DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to prove the safety and efficacy of the Linox smart S DX ICD lead.
DOC.brief_title: Linox Smart S DX PME/Master Study
DOC.criteria: Patients with standard ICD indication Be available for followup visits on a regular basis at an approved investigational center Patients with standard ICD contraindication Patients with permanent atrial fibrillation Have a life expectancy of less than six months Are expecting to receive cardiac surgery within 6 months after enrollment Age < 18 years Not enrolled in another cardiac clinical investigation
